title: Bad image 00cx000012f
body: i was always using the legacy client and when i went to open league on 4/25/2017 it installed the new client then i clicked launch and it said bad image 00cx000012f and ive reinstalled league restarted my computer and ive went through the game crash guide any help?

replies.body: Your transition to the updated client may not have installed correctly, so it's resulting in an error like that.  My suggestion would be to grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a reinstall to get everything up to date.  Thanks for the detailed info, and let me know if I can help!
